I am talented individual who will bring my sales talent, fashion sense, and passion for clothing to your company. i have a proven track record of success in sales .i am looking for suitable position with a company that offers there staff superb career opportunities, job enrichment and a supportive work environment.

Handling the complete sales process.

Converting prospects into active clients.

Company Name
City ,

Received payment by cash, check, credit cards Issue receipts, refunds, credits, or change due to customers.
Submitted orders by referring to price lists and product literature.
Kept management informed by submitting activity and results reports, such as daily call reports, weekly work plans, and monthly and annual territory analyses.
Monitored competition by gathering current marketplace information on pricing, new products.
Recommend changes in products, service, and policy by evaluating results and competitive developments.
Maximized sales opportunities through outstanding customer service.
Established and maintain good customer relations, with both internal and external customers.
Spent time in the field promoting demonstrating company products.

City ,

Maintain an awareness of all promotions and advertisements.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Sports Minded Promotional Sales

Location: Chicago, IL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Customer Service, Education, Training

Description:
Are you a dynamic marketing professional with a competitive edge? Be Marketable is seeking a Marketing and Promotions Associate to join our team and help us achieve success.
We operate like a competitive sports team, with core values of leadership, integrity, teamwork, and accountability. Our team is trained daily on customer service techniques, marketing initiatives, and business communications strategies, and we place a strong emphasis on building rapport with our customers.
As a Marketing and Promotions Associate, you will work directly with and report to the Marketing Manager. This may involve researching target markets, participating in product knowledge seminars and morning meetings, and providing direct customer service and sales support to consumers. You can expect to gain insight into innovative marketing and communications strategies through full participation in company activities and directives.
Essential duties and responsibilities include assisting Account Managers with customer interactions and sales support, assisting with the launch of new campaigns and products, accurately inputting customer data and tracking sales records, attending and learning all product knowledge for clients, and applying it in actual consumer interactions and marketing initiatives. You'll also develop skills in training, coaching, and leadership, and may be assigned additional duties as needed.
At Be Marketable, we value teamwork and seek good communication and cooperation within our organization. We coordinate all routine aspects of customer orders, requests, and inquiries, identify and use internal resources as needed to complete tasks, support team goals, and are receptive/flexible/adaptable to change. We also identify and generate new sales opportunities through relationship building.
To be successful in this role, you should have customer service, customer solutions, and/or sales experience, as well as effective decision-making skills, interpersonal and communication skills, and the ability to deliver timely and accurate information to customers and internal business partners. You should also have a strong understanding of our client's products and services and be able to recognize and respond to new/additional opportunities for existing customers.
Join our team at Be Marketable and become a part of our competitive and dynamic environment. Let's work together to achieve success!
We are an equal opportunity employer. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or any other protected status. We are committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace where all individuals are valued and respected.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
<JD_END>
